tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Finished T24 at the Mainland China Qualifying Tournament to earn conditional-exempt status for the PGA TOUR China Series' season.  

2014: Made his lone cut of the season, at the Mission Hills Haikou Open. Was 2-over at the event at the Sandbelt Trails Course to finish T43…Finished 69th at the OneAsia Tour's Nanshan China Masters in mid-October…Made his third PGA TOUR China cut of the season by T55 at the Cadillac Championship in Beijing…After missing the cut at the Jianye Tianzhu Henan Open, he posted his best finish of the season, a T31 at the Nine Dragons Open. Shot a 1-under 71 on the final day…Returned to PGA TOUR China action in November when he T31 at the Nine Dragons Open…The following week, added a T24 at the Hainan Open in Sanya.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T24th in 2014 at the Sanya Hainan Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T11th in Victory Leaders on the PGA Tour China Series.
